segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, drying dishes so diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water's overflowing; it's spilling all over the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even looking; her focus is totally on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's growing on the floor, right under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, and he's pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's there, waiting patiently with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back; this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're having fun, though, in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, bushes neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that the adult doesn't see the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, it all turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrasting scene inside and out.
segments.speaker: PAR
